body.p: The non‑controlling interest of CU134 has two components. The first component is the reclassification of the non‑controlling interest’s share of the accounting acquirer’s retained earnings immediately before the acquisition (CU1,400 × 6.7 per cent or CU93.80). The second component represents the reclassification of the non‑controlling interest’s share of the accounting acquirer’s issued equity (CU600 × 6.7 per cent or CU40.20).
